pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 10 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, October 10, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will depart for Washington, D.C., United States of America.

Canada Reception Centre (Hangar 11)
Macdonald-Cartier International Airport
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity for departure

Washington, United States of America

4:10 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Washington, D.C., United States of America.

Andrews Air Force Base
Washington, D.C., United States of America

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Fortune Most Powerful Women Summit and Gala.

National Portrait Gallery
8th & F Streets, NW

Note for media:

  • Open coverage of the Prime Minister’s keynote discussion with Ms. Pattie Sellers, Fortune, at 8:00 p.m.

Note: all times local
